articles.author: Reporter
articles.title: New species of dinosaur with more than 400 teeth discovered in Europe - Offaly Live
articles.description: A new species of dinosaur with more than 400 teeth which ate in a similar way to ducks and flamingos has been discovered in Germany. The fossil of the nearly complete Balaenognathus maeuseri, part of the pterosaur family, was discovered accidentally in a Bava…
articles.content:
A new species of dinosaur with more than 400 teeth which ate in a similar way to ducks and flamingos has been discovered in Germany.
